Title: Equus
Cast: Richard Burton, Peter Firth, Colin Blakely, Joan Plowright, Harry Andrews, Eileen Atkins, Jenny Agutter, Kate Reid, John Wyman, Elva Mai Hoover, Ken James, Patrick Brymer
Plot: A psychiatrist attempts to uncover a troubled stable boy's disturbing obsession with horses. A psychiatrist, Martin Dysart, investigates the savage blinding of six horses with a metal spike in a stable in Hampshire, England. The atrocity was committed by an unassuming seventeen-year-old stable boy named Alan Strang, the only son of an opinionated but inwardly-timid father and a genteel, religious mother. As Dysart exposes the truths behind the boy's demons, he finds himself face-to-face with his own. Written by Serenleono <verax@mindspring.com>
Keywords: topless female nudity, bare chested male, penis, genitals, male nudity
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 4 nominations.
Actors: Richard Burton, Peter Firth, Colin Blakely
Description: Directed by Sidney Lumet.  With Richard Burton, Peter Firth, Colin Blakely, Joan Plowright. A psychiatrist attempts to uncover a troubled stable boy's disturbing obsession with horses.
